I've got a question though, maybe someone can help me with this. Every time I download a discography and I put these songs in iTunes, I can't change the properties of the songs (title, artist etc.). How do I do this?

@SirSMY - That's weird, you should try opening it in Winamp (www.winamp.com) then rightclick the tracks in winamp and press Alt+3 (3 not on your numpad) and you should be able to edit the tag and also the ID3v1 and ID3v2 tags. Hope it works.

Hey guys! Thanks for all the positive reviews, I really appreciate it. I'm so happy to see this torrent is still going strong after all this time.

Also, any and all problems with the tracks themselves were unbeknownst to me. I used to listen to all these tracks all the time on my own before I actually compiled them into a torrent, and I never had any issues with them. If you DO have any problems, all the albums I have came straight from thepiratebay in the first place so you can easily download whatever is damaged/missing. My apologies for any issues anyone might have had.
